title: Correction to: Got rhythm? Rhythmicity differences reflect different optimality criteria in feeding and locomotor systems
content: This is a correction to: Lukas Faltings, Melody W. Young, Callum F. Ross, and Michael C. Granatosky, Got rhythm? Rhythmicity differences reflect different optimality criteria in feeding and locomotor systems, in Evolution, Volume 76, Issue 9, 1 September 2022, Pages 2181â€“2090, https://doi.org/10.1111/evo.14569.
